properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 10 at 10:06AM CST by NWS Nashville TN
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a Flood Advisory for the
following rivers in Middle Tennessee...

Cumberland River At Omohundro Water Plant affecting Davidson County

. Recent and expected rainfall, along with upstream releases will
keep the Cumberland River running above normal until further notice.

The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a
* Flood Advisory for
The Cumberland River At Omohundro Water Plant
* At 9 AM Monday the stage was 35.7 feet.
* Action stage is 35.0 feet.
* Flood stage is 41.0 feet.
* The Cumberland through the Nashville area will remain above normal
levels through this week.
* At 35.0 feet...Low lying areas along both sides of the river are inundated,
including portions of Shelby Bottoms Park.
properties.instruction:
Stay tuned to NOAA weather radio or other local media for further information
from the National Weather Service.
